explains: adj. （国家或地区）不发达的，经济落后的；发育不全的；（胶卷）显影不足的
v. （使）发展不完全；（使）显影不足（underdevelop 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: underdeveloped country 不发达国家，发展中国家（等于developing country）

sentences.en: His theory was inapplicable to many underdeveloped economies.
sentences.cn: 他的理论不适用于许多不发达的经济体。

sentences.en: Underdeveloped countries should be assisted by allowing them access to modern technology.
sentences.cn: 应该通过允许不发达国家使用现代技术来帮助它们。

sentences.en: Low average population densities are characteristics of most underdeveloped countries.
sentences.cn: 平均人口密度低是大多数不发达国家的特点。
